english.segment1: I thought I did what's right. I thought I had the answer. I thought I chose the surest road. But that road brought me here. So I put up a fight. And told You how to help me. And just when I had given up. The truth is coming clear, for..
english.segment2: You know..Better Than I. You know..the way. I've let go..the need to know why. 'Cause You know Better Than I
english.segment3: If this has been a test. I cannot see the reason. But maybe knowing, I don't know. Is part of getting thru. I try to do what's best. Find faith has made it easy. To see the best thing I can do. Is put my faith in You, for..
english.segment4: I saw one cloud, and thought it was the sky. I saw a bird and thought that I could follow. But it was You who tought them to fly. If I let You reach me.. Will You teach me? For..
english.segment5: You know..Better Than I. You know..the way. I've let go..the need to know why. I'll take what answers You supply. 'Cause You know Better Than I
